CALLFLOW_GENERIC_INVALID_FORM: Form is invalid. Check fields and send it again.
CALLFLOW_DESIGNER_FLOW_TEST_SECTION_DESC: The data you provide here are not saved in the Call Flow and they are only used for testing
CALLFLOW_DESIGNER_TEST_CALL_GENERAL_DESC: Start a call and test it end-to-end using configured provider.
CALLFLOW_DESIGNER_TEST_FLOW_GENERAL_DESC: Test the callflow without using configured provider.
CALLFLOW_INIT_CALL_MODAL_TEXT: Are you sure you want to initiate a test call?
CALLFLOW_CONFIG_FORM_TEMPLATE_NOTE: Type HTTP request. Use values provided in query params (eg. foo=bar) instead of sections between square brackets (eg. [foo])
CALLFLOW_CONFIG_FORM_HEADERS_NOTE: Use header1: value1, header 2: value 2, format to create a map with HTTP POST request header parameters
CALLFLOW_CONFIG_FORM_USERS_NOTE: Add test users for testing with simulation programs. The provided Outbound URLs will override the above Outgoing call URI template for those users' phone numbers
CALLFLOW_CONFIG_FORM_SERVICE_MAP_NOTE: Map of services that can be injected in IVR templates. Key is the name used in Velocity, Value is the id of Spring Bean
CALLFLOW_CONFIG_FORM_NAME_IS_NOT_UNIQUE: Each config must have their unique name
CALLFLOW_DIRTY_LABEL: Content can be safely edited manually without losing changes as renderer is OFF.
CALLFLOW_NON_DIRTY_LABEL: Auto generation via renderer template is ON
CALLFLOW_MISSING_TEMPLATE: Missing template for the following renderer:
CALLFLOW_FLOW_RANGE_HELP: x..y or x or ..y or x..
CALLFLOW_FLOW_REPROMPT_HELP: No. of times to repeat/reprompt if no input/match
